## StateDbConfig type

Represents a key/value object with configurations of the db properties.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type StateDbConfig<TState> = {
    [key in keyof TState]: StatePropConfig;
};
```
<b>References:</b> [StatePropConfig](./state-db.statepropconfig.md)
